Ms. Colusi is waiting just next to door, leaning her hefty frame against the wall. She gives you a perky smile as you meet her. “Ah, there you are James. All freshened up? Good, I think it’s time we should head to lunch. It’s rather fitting having food after your....first hand experience with it.”

Walking down the hall with Ms. Colusi, you can’t help but stare a bit at the sight in front of you. Your teacher is walking in front of you, giving you a front row view of her fat cheeks again. Her ass is clearly outlined through her pants, showing a well-defined crack and two meaty globes that sway hypnotically from side to side with each step. Attempting to subdue tempting thoughts of your cooking teacher in your head, you walk up beside her and try asking her a question.

“So Ms. Colusi, this is a bit weird...well, everything in the past hour or so has been weird but what exactly do I taste like?”

Your full-bodied teacher smiles with a dreamy look on her face. “Oh, you just tasted heavenly darling. You have a smooth texture with a sweet taste as well as aftertaste, reminiscent of that of a strawberry. “

You can’t help but have a surprised expression on you face. You didn’t really expect such a detailed answer. Then again, she is a cooking teacher. “Really? I taste like that? I didn’t think I’d be very appealing...”

“With a developed palette such as mine, everyone has a unique taste to call their own. I think your taste matches you perfectly. Ah! It appears we arrived just in time.”


What happens at the cafeteria?
1332111112111.title: Ms. Colusi lets you out

13321111121111.content:
Entering the cafeteria, you and Ms. Colusi go get your food. The cafeteria itself was incredibly spacious, having dozens of tables and food stations. It reminds you of a buffet where you can add different types of food to your plate. After grabbing yourself a moderately sized meal and your teacher grabbing a far larger amount, you both look for somewhere to sit. You see some of the larger girls sitting a few tables over start to look at you hungrily, licking their lips and sizing you up. You’re glad that you’re with Ms. Colusi or else you think that these girls might not think twice about snatching you up.

“Oh, I think I’ve found Roxy and her friends! How about we join them? They’re a great group of girls, I think you’ll like them. I certainly know they’ll like you James.” Ms Colusi points out as you see Roxy’s familiar large frame waving at you from a table nearby. Roxy is easily taller than most but the two other girls sitting next to her are even fatter and taller than she is!

“Oh hey James, how’s it going? Sit down with us!”

You take a seat next to Roxy while Ms. Colusi places her colossal rear right next to you, leaving both of their thigh fat to spill out and press against you. Looking up, you meet the gaze of two massive girls looking at you with interest.

“James, I’d like to introduce you to two of my friends, Zoey and Brenda.”

“Uh hi there, I’m James, nice to meet you.” you say as you get an eyeful of these two giants.

The first girl named Zoey has short, reddish hair with well toned muscles on her arms and the rest of her body having a tremendous amount of fat. A jacket that covers her torso but does absolutely nothing to cover her monster of a doughy belly. Her clothing seems to have a punkish/rock look as she’s wearing studded bracelets, a very revealing skirt, striped leggings and boots.

The other girl, Brenda, has long, black hair and is the tallest of the two, being nearly taller than Ms. Colusi. A casual black shirt exposes her ginormous fat belly that hangs freely and her nylon pants outlines her fat, giving vivid detail to the cellulite on her thighs.

Leaning her face down, Zoey gives you a grin. “So you’re James huh? Well I’m Zoey and I gotta say, Roxy was right! You are pretty cute.”

“See? I told you guys!”

“We know, we know, just don’t hog him all to yourself.” the girl named Brenda says as she looks down at you with a smile.

“I’m Brenda, nice to meet ya. So how’s your first day at St. Olga’s been?”

“Well to put it bluntly, weird. I’ve only been in one class and I already have too many questions.”

Brenda gives off a shrug. “Eh, don’t worry, you’ll get used to it. There’s some strange stuff here but don’t feel intimidated. Sure, there are a lot of real assholes here-“

“Like that bitch Melany and her gang.” Zoey scoffed.

“Or Ms. Domm. Everybody hates her.” Roxy also added.

“But there are some good people here too. So don’t be afraid to try and get to know them.” Brenda reassured you.

For the rest of the lunch period, you talk and even share a few laughs with the girls while they chowed down. You felt more comfortable with them, after all, they acted pretty sincere and open towards you, although a little bit too open. As you talked more, you learned a little bit about more about them. You knew Roxy was quite bubbly, but you didn’t know that she enjoyed skateboarding, as difficult as that seems. Brenda was actually in her early twenties and a great player on the volleyball team along with Zoey. Zoey had the habit of being quite fond of swearing as well as bragging about her ass, which annoyed Roxy and Brenda to no end.

“And then Ms. Colusi swallowed you? Must of been pretty freaked out being gobbled up and everything for the first time...” Brenda asks you as she takes a final bite of her sandwich.

“Well, it was pretty bizarre at first, but as strange as this sounds, I don’t think it was that bad. I think I even enjoyed it.”

“Really? Well glad you were comfortable with it. If it’s okay with you, could I swallow you up sometime? Maybe try out my back entrance?” she says with a grin.

You do your best to hold back from spitting your drink out in surprise from what she just asked. “W-What?” Can she really swallow people like Ms. Colusi? How many people in this school are be able to do that?

“Yeah, I’m a pro at this stuff! Ms. Colusi gulped you down pretty quick, so a cute little thing like you has gotta taste pretty good.”

“I can confirm your suspicions, he does have a heavenly taste...” Ms. Colusi chimes in.

Roxy turns her head at Brenda with a look of concern mixed with jealousy. “Brenda cmon, don’t freak him out.”

“I’m not trying to! He said he was fine inside Ms. Colusi, so I was just suggesting it. What if I try sitting on him? I think I can be gentle enough...” she replies defensively.

“Brenda!”

“What? He’d be alright! He would only be under me for a few minutes tops. Besides, weren’t we all talking about the same thing and more earlier?”

“At least we were gonna be subtle about it...”

“Since when have either of you been subtle?”

“When have you?!”

You can only watch as these girls continue to argue. Ms. Colusi doesn’t interfere and instead sips contently with her drink as if this was nothing special. Only a few minutes pass by and the bickering is already gone and replaced with giggling.

“Sorry about that James, didn’t mean to come in on ya. We’re nice girls, really, it’s just we can get...playful sometimes. Well, a lot of times actually. But don’t worry about that, we’ll show you we can be good girls, especially with a cutie like you.” Brenda apologizes as she ruffles your hair.

A sudden gleam shows in Ms. Colusi’s eyes as she appears to remember something important. “Ah! I just remembered! I forgot to ask you about improving your skills. James, how would you like to have some private tutoring with me? You possess impressive cooking skills which can be refined into something truly extraordinary with the right training.”

You pause for a moment. It doesn’t seem like a bad deal, in fact it’s the first time a teacher has ever offered you after school teaching. “Well, I don’t see why not. When would we meet?”

Ms. Colusi clasps her hands together in satisfaction. “Excellent! I suppose we’ll meet on the first 2 days of the week, around 4 or so. We’ll go over some techniques along with some basic cooking practice for about an hour. With my guidance, I’ll make sure that your skills are put to good use.”


Lunch soon ends and just as you’re on your way, you feel a large mass of something fleshy and warm press softly against your back.

“Hey James, hold on a sec. I wanna ask you something.”

Turning around, your view is blocked by a large globular stomach and it’s owner, Roxy, looking down at you. “Since it’s almost the weekend we were thinking about hanging out and spending the night at Brenda’s room. Wanna join us?”

Although you’ve warmed up to these girls, the idea of spending the night with them seems like a recipe for disaster. A short boy with three ginormous girls in a single room leaves you with a lot of ideas of how it could go wrong. The most prominent being stuck underneath one of them. It doesn’t help knowing that after listening to Brenda’s suggestions they have more....personal interests in mind. Still, you think it’s worth it to give your first friends at this school a chance.

“Sure! When would you-“

“Sweet! This is gonna be great James, I promise!” Roxy says as she suddenly grabs you and smashes you into her chest mounds with a bear hug. Your almost afraid you’ll get lost in her cleavage canyon until she finally releases you from her iron grip. “I’ll text you the details later. Later James!” says Roxy as she walks away with her butt swinging side to side in anticipation.

A lot’s happened in just the first half of your day. What happens next?
13321111121111.title: Roxy and Her Gigantic Friends

133211111211111.content:
Your next class is Algebra. Eventually, you navigate through the large halls and even larger students to find your classroom. The room has a look to it. Everything from the posters to the desks seem to be arranged in an orderly fashion. As you’re making you’re way to a desk, a hand easily bigger than your head grabs your shoulder. A woman just as tall and fat as Ms. Colusi is looking down at you with glaring eyes. Her pitch black hair is combed neat with a bun in the back and a pair of glasses hang on top of her nose. Plump, pouty lips sprout from her face as they form a neutral expression on her face.

“Just a minute. You’re that new student aren’t you? James Sawyer?”

“Yes that’s me.”

“Age 17? 4 feet tall? Transferred here today?”

“Um...yes?”

“Good. My name is Ms. Domm and I’ll be your Algebra teacher for this course. I’ve been notified of your “problem” and I can safely assure you that I will keep a close eye to make sure you aren’t in any danger. However,” she says as she leans her face close to yours, “if you cause any trouble in my classroom I will make sure you are used as my personal cushion for half the semester. I want nothing more than for the students in my class to be obedient. Understood?”

Gulping, you nod and mutter out a weak yes. Giving a subtle yet grimacing smirk, Ms. Domm then directs you to find a seat. A lot of the desks in this classroom are resized to accommodate students who have a larger set of hips. Many of the larger girls are looking at you with hungry eyes filled as they size you up and even lick their lips. You keep walking down the row of desks but you can’t seem to find a spot anywhere.

“Yo! James! Over here!” A familiar voice calls out from your left. Turning your head around you see the big girl you met at lunch Zoey.

“Zoey? You’re in this class too?”

“Yep, pretty cool huh? I’d say it’s nice to have a friend in class with me but unfortunately for both of us it’s with Ms. Domm. She’s one of the biggest bitches here in the school, right behind Melony. You really don’t wanna piss her off.”

“What should I do to stay off her bad side?”

“A lot. You gotta answer her questions quick, don’t talk during class, don’t look funny, sit up straight, don’t chew gum, and don’t write in red ink just to name a few things. It’s a long list but as long as you stick with me you’ll make it through.”

As you are talking with Zoey, you suddenly hear heavy footsteps get closer and closer towards you until you hear your teacher’s booming voice dripping with impatience. “Mr Sawyer, is there are a problem? Class is about to start.”

“Well, it’s just...there’s no desk for me to sit on...” you explain to her.

A blank yet focused expression comes across your teacher’s face as she appears to be in deep thought. She appears to have an idea as she turns her plump head towards Zoey. “How about this. Why don’t you lend your friend some space Zoey? I’m sure you’ve got some room to spare on your seat somewhere. Perhaps on your lap? Or if you find things to be unsatisfactory he can always be underneath you.”

You knew exactly where this was going so you try to suggest something else that didn’t involve being stuck underneath someone’s ass. “Couldn’t we just take a desk from another classroom? It would be a lot-“

“And interrupt whoever’s in that class? That’s rude, ignorant and above all, unprofessional. Or if you find things to be unsatisfactory with Zoey you can always sit with me. I’m sure you and I will both be quite comfortable together on my chair...” she suggests with a threatening yet sensual tone.

You didn’t like your choices but if you were going to share a seat with someone in this class it should be with Zoey. “Uh well, I’m sure Zoey could share with me. Right Zoey?”

Zoey’s eyes light up at the opportunity in front of her and gives a quick “Yes!” before wrapping a thick arm around you and pulling you close against her pillowy frame.

“James, you got nothing to worry about, my ass will be sure to treat you right. Not to mention give you one hell of an experience.” she states with a slap of her soft ass, making it jiggle a few seconds. Her ass is barely covered by a skirt and her panties look more like butt floss as they’re being swallowed up by her colossal, meaty cheeks.

“A-Are you sure? This stuff usually doesn’t end well for me...”

“Positive! I’ll be gentle!” Zoey replies with a confident grin on her face.

“Well what about sitting on your lap?” you ask with blood rushing to your face. Both of these choices were embarrassing as hell but at least sitting on her lap would be less dangerous.

“Well...yeah, that’s true I guess,” she says with disappointment in her voice, “but would we have enough room for our notes and stuff?”

You don’t like to admit it but she does have a point. If you don’t have anywhere to put your stuff, then you’d just be sitting there listening and not taking notes. You could just copy Zoey’s notes after class but this could also be done in the case of being under her cavernous rear.

Her sweatpants were now replaced with skin-hugging shorts. Her ass, normally concealed under baggy bottoms, was now exposed to the cool breeze as it wafted up her summer skirt.
